articles.description: Although Martial has resurrected his Old Trafford career under Ten Hag after a spell on loan at Sevilla, he has only played six times this campaign due to hamstring, achilles and back problems.
articles.content:
Erik ten Hag says Anthony Martial is vital to Manchester United's hopes of finishing in the top four but has to find a way of staying injury-free for the rest of the season.
Although Martial has res… [+4041 chars]
